description: Local represents directly-attached storage with node affinity (Beta feature)

fsType.description: Filesystem type to mount. It applies only when the Path is a block device. Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system. Ex. "ext4", "xfs", "ntfs". The default value is to auto-select a fileystem if unspecified.

path.description: The full path to the volume on the node. It can be either a directory or block device (disk, partition, ...).
